definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
to accompany/to follow/to occur together with/concomitant
(of an elderly couple) husband or wife
to accompany sb/to accompany each other
to go with sb/to form companionships
to be a dancing partner to sb/to perform as a backup dancer/taxi dancer (hired dancing partner)/escort
erhua variant of 老伴[lao3 ban4]

sentences.english: Life is a collection of experiences. Let us be your guide.
sentences.chinese: 生活是繁复体验的集锦，让我们伴您探索。

sentences.english: It's so late! Damned duck! It lost its partners.
sentences.chinese: 搞得我这么晚了，这死鸭，它走脱伴了。

sentences.english: Reports of variation in the stool pattern with certain elements of the diet suggest dietary intolerance.
sentences.chinese: 大便形态各异伴未消化食物提示为饮食不耐受。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate a new method of genioplasty for treatment of a prominent mandibular angle with mandibular malformation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索治疗下颌角肥大伴颏畸形时隆颏的新方法。

sentences.english: Fourth, the urination barrier partner leucorrhea increases.
White bean cannelloni salad with red, green, and yellow peppers with tomato concasse.
sentences.chinese: 白豆碎肉沙拉伴红椒，绿椒和黄椒，番茄碎。

sentences.english: Fried mutton fat with onions goes well with vodka.
sentences.chinese: 油炸肥羊肉伴洋葱，再加上一杯伏特加就是绝配了。

sentences.english: Your transistor radio can accompany you wherever you go.
sentences.chinese: 晶体管收音机伴你走四方。

sentences.english: I assure the injured jury that a sure insurance is ensured.
sentences.chinese: 我让蒙伤的伴审团确信一笔有掌握的保险得到确实保。

sentences.english: Two cases of phlegmonous gastritis complicated with subdural hematoma are reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 报告了二例蜂窝织性胃炎伴发硬脑膜下血肿。

sentences.english: Your teachings urge me to the wind and rain, my heart till blessings with you day and night.
sentences.chinese: 您的教诲催我风雨兼程，我的祝福伴您昼夜心耕。

sentences.english: Dogs can be great running companions.
When all into space, with only my memories.
sentences.chinese: 当一切成空，惟有回忆伴我。

sentences.english: Months to double festival especially bright, happy holiday with you do.
sentences.chinese: 月到双节分外明，节日喜气伴你行。

sentences.english: Methods:47 patients divided into convulsive group and non-convulsive group.
sentences.chinese: 将47例病人分为伴抽搐组和非抽搐组。

sentences.english: But when acute stomach volvulus occurrs with necrosis of stomach wall, gastrostomy should be performed.
sentences.chinese: 但对急性胃扭转伴胃壁坏死者，应加胃造瘘术。

definition: to accompany sb/to accompany each other
to be alone/to stand in isolation
to know oneself/to be intimate or close/intimate friend
(children) run around parent's knees/fig. to stay to look after one's elderly parents
